key_points.text:
Positive Sentiment:
Mizuho raised its price objective on Evergy from $70.00 to $74.00 and maintained an “outperform” rating, implying roughly 7.4% upside.
Mizuho Forecasts Strong Price Appreciation for Evergy Stock
Positive Sentiment:
BMO Capital’s James Thalacker reiterated a Buy rating on Evergy with a $75.00 price target, citing favorable regulatory developments and solid economic prospects.

Evergy Schedules Conference Call to Discuss 2nd Quarter Results
Overall, the recent analyst upgrades and upcoming earnings discussion are key factors influencing EVRG’s trading activity.
Evergy Inc. (NASDAQ: EVRG) shares have reacted to a series of analyst upgrades and the announcement of an upcoming earnings call.
